short_summary: 35035-221221, GOC5093216 acquisition of SA E60PQ-120001 Office Seating
description: Acquisition de fauteuils de bureau pour le bureau regional des ministres a Montréal
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Acquisition of SA E60PQ-120001 Office Seating for the Minister’s Regional Office in Montreal

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3692808392
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3692808392
* **Publication Date**: October 13, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 25, 2022, at 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entity

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** (General Government)
* **Contractor Contact Information**:
  * **Name**: Lisa-Marie Julien
  * **Email**: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description

* The Canadian government is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of office seating (SA E60PQ-120001) for the Minister's regional office located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.
* Interested suppliers must submit all required supporting documentation and bids by the tender closing date, otherwise, the bid will be declared non-responsive.
* For details of the contract, terms, and conditions please refer to the RFP document.

### Additional Information

* The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.
* All tender responses should be submitted electronically via the official procurement tool for the specific government organization.
* Bidders are expected to meet all the qualification requirements listed in this tender notice and comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the RFP document.

#UNSPSC Classification
* 56112100 - Seating

Note* The notation indicates the UNSPSC code number that pertains to the acquisition. You can find the code details and associated category here*: <https://unstats.un.org/unsd/classif/UNSD-classification-of-products-service.aspx> 


Your commitment to ensuring these submissions are up to high standards truly made a big difference, and it's gone into the swelling difference I make on this platform.
